name: Legion Commander
title: Tresdin
lore: Tresdin, the Legion Commander, was the only survivor when demons destroyed the Bronze Legion. She rebuilt and leads again.

overwhelmingOdds.name: Overwhelming Odds
overwhelmingOdds.description: Deals damage based on the number of enemies in an area. Gains movement speed for each hero hit.

pressTheAttack.name: Press the Attack
pressTheAttack.description: Empowers an ally, granting attack speed and HP regeneration.

momentOfCourage.name: Moment of Courage
momentOfCourage.description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.

duel.name: Duel
duel.description: Forces a target to fight Legion Commander one-on-one. The winner gains permanent damage.

25: Press the Attack Applies Strong Dispel
